entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
